Common-Knowledge.description: Common perspective agnostic knowledge without spoilers, what a character looking things up casually online would find.

Type-1-Clearance.description: Knowledge which gives more insight into the sprawl and some anomalies.

Type-2-Clearance.description: The depths of the sprawl are known, the archivers as well.  Stranger anomalies as well.  Insights into our lost ancestors also are provided...

Type-3-Clearance.description: Galactic knowledge, the secrets of the galaxy and insights into what is really going on are known.

All-Knowledge.description: The god perspective of the universe.

Plexus-Only.description: Only has Plexus Knowledge. (May be combined w/ the clearance profile?)
